item.title: Dhananjay add a quote by Meher Baba
item.description: "Mastery in Servitude" -- Meher Baba

item.title: Dhananjay add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "Folks are usually about as happy as they make their minds up to be." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Dhananjay add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "Whatever you are, be a good one." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Dhananjay add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "America will never be destroyed from the outside. If we falter and lose our freedoms, it will be because we destroyed ourselves." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Dhananjay add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "And in the end it is not the years in your life that count, it's the life in your years." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Dhananjay add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "Do I not destroy my enemies when I make them my friends?" -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Dhananjay add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "My Best Friend is a person who will give me a book I have not read." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Dhananjay add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "Books serve to show a man that those original thoughts of his aren't very new after all." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Dhananjay add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "Nearly all men can stand adversity, but if you want to test a man's character, give him power." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Dhananjay add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "My concern is not whether God is on our side; my greatest concern is to be on God's side, for God is always right." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Dhananjay add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "When I do good, I feel good. When I do bad, I feel bad. That's my religion." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Dhananjay add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "Those who deny freedom to others deserve it not for themselves." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Dhananjay add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "I'm a success today because I had a friend who believed in me and I didn't have the heart to let him down." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Dhananjay add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "How many legs does a dog have if you call the tail a leg? Four. Calling a tail a leg doesn't make it a leg." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Dhananjay add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "Whenever I hear anyone arguing for slavery, I feel a strong impulse to see it tried on him personally." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Dhananjay add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "Those who look for the bad in people will surely find it." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Dhananjay add a quote by Eugene B. Sledge
item.description: "Your soul may belong to Jesus, but your ass belongs to the marines." -- Eugene B. Sledge

item.title: Dhananjay add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Each night, when I go to sleep, I die. And the next morning, when I wake up, I am reborn." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Dhananjay add a quote by Janet Fitch
item.description: "The phoenix must burn to emerge." -- Janet Fitch

item.title: Dhananjay add a quote by Christopher Poindexter
item.description: "I am always reborn in her eyes. I think that's what love is: tasting your rebirth over and over and over every single day like the sun when it explodes with fire from the sea." -- Christopher Poindexter

item.title: Dhananjay add a quote by Barbara Kingsolver
item.description: "In my own worst seasons I've come back from the colorless world of despair by forcing myself to look hard, for a long time, at a single glorious thing: a flame of red geranium outside my bedroom window. And then another: my daughter in a yellow dress. And another: the perfect outline of a full, dark sphere behind the crescent moon. Until I learned to be in love with my life again. Like a stroke victim retraining new parts of the brain to grasp lost skills, I have taught myself joy, over and over again(15)." -- Barbara Kingsolver
